title: Sketchbook Folio, "The Madonna and Child Enthroned with Saints; Study after Panetti or Costa", 1821–22
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white heavy wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left: 38 Panetti o' Costa Ferrara
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Madonna with Child standing on knee, on ornate throne within niche. Throne richly decorated in Renaissance style. Below, at left and right, St. George and unidentified St.
